name: Rock Papper Scissor Game
description: This project is a classic implementation of the Rock–Paper–Scissors game using Python. It allows users to play against the computer in a fun, interactive way.

name: Monday Motivation
description: An automated positivity engine that detects when a new week begins and instantly delivers an inspiring quote to kickstart the day with the right mindset.

name: BMI Calculator
description: Calculates your body metrics instantly, helping you track your physical health without doing the complicated math yourself.
